summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1582, for the improvement of Sunnyside Avenue, from the north line of Baltimore Addition to the City of Seattle to North Forty-second Street; and North Forty-second Street, from Sunnyside Avenue to First Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary openings, wyes, manholes, lampholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16873 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
